posts.title: Docker Optimization Part 2: Intelligent Caching for R Shiny Applications
posts.excerpt: Advanced Docker caching strategies: hash-based base images, cache busting for external packages, and tests as build gates. Learn how we reduced base image rebuilds by 85% and made tests a mandatory build gate.

posts.title: Optimizing R Shiny Docker Builds: Warm vs Cold Build Strategy
posts.excerpt: How we optimized Docker builds for a customer-facing R Shiny SaaS application by separating code changes (8-15 min) from dependency changes (40 min) and reduced image sizes by 42%. Learn the practical techniques that transformed our CI/CD pipeline at Alamar Biosciences.
